title: Subject matter
summary: Article 1 defines the purpose and scope of the EU Artificial Intelligence Act. Its goal is to ensure a high level of protection for health, safety, fundamental rights, and democratic values while supporting the uptake of human-centric and trustworthy AI in the internal market. The Article introduces harmonised rules for marketing and using AI systems, including specific requirements for high-risk AI and obligations for operators. It also sets prohibitions for certain AI practices, transparency rules, governance mechanisms, and measures to support innovation, especially for SMEs and start-ups.
